channel.title: Bioconductor on Rene Welch
channel.description: Recent content in Bioconductor on Rene Welch

item.title: Bioconductor slides
item.description: Last week, I gave a presentation about developing R packages with Bioconductor. The slides are available here Besides the slides, I created a format based on the amazing ninjutsu, kunoichi with the Bioconductor colors.
